duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate and lead a team responsible for drafting, reviewing, and finalizing preliminary and final site plans and construction documents.
Review project survey data utilizing the latest technology and industry software.
Plan, organize and supervise survey crews, technicians and office staff members.
Provide oversight on large scale ALTA surveys as they pertain to solar or wind power generation.

Provide construction-related services and guide junior team members to complete items such as permit applications, cut sheets, quantity estimates, and transmittals; organize site plans, construction plans, construction sheet set-up and assembly and other related construction documents.
Attend paid training and development events, industry conferences, and networking opportunities.
Assist with your staff's new hire training plan, career planning, and continuous professional development at Atwell.
Reward and motivate your staff with spot bonuses and Peer Recognition Rewards.

education_certification.credential: Professional Survey License, or the ability to obtain 8+ plus years of survey industry related work experience
